SELECT qustion.id as qId, qustion.title,qustion.type,qustion.content,qustion.deep,qustion.collect,qustion.readcount,qustion.hotnum,qustion.price,qustion.good,qustion.meet,qustion.gmt_create,user.nickname, qustion.uid,(select count(reply.id) as replaycount from red_ask_reply reply where reply.qid=qustion.id) as reply ,tags.id as ctid,tag.name as tname,tag.img as timg,tag.sort as tsort FROM red_interview_question qustion LEFT OUTER JOIN edu_user user ON qustion.uid=user.id LEFT OUTER JOIN red_interview_tags tags ON tags.qid = qustion.id LEFT OUTER JOIN red_category_tag tag ON tag.id = tags.tid
where tag.id = #{tag}
ORDER BY qustion.hotnum
ORDER BY qustion.gmt_create
ORDER BY qustion.readcount
DESC limit 20

SELECT question.id as qId, question.uid,question.title,question.type,question.content,question.collect,question.readcount,question.hotnum,question.price,question.good,question.gmt_create, user.nickname, user.avatar,(select count(reply.id) from red_ask_reply reply where reply.qid=question.id) as reply,tag.id as ctid,tag.name as tname,tag.img as timg,tag.sort as tsort FROM red_interview_question question LEFT OUTER JOIN edu_user user ON question.uid=user.id LEFT OUTER JOIN red_interview_tags tags ON tags.qid = question.id LEFT OUTER JOIN red_category_tag tag ON tag.id = tags.tid WHERE question.id=#{tId}
